column1: Lakeside City is a town in Archer County
column3: United States. It is part of the Wichita Falls
column4: Texas Metropolitan Statistical Area. The population was 997 at the 2010 census.

column1: Lakeside City is located in northeastern Archer County at 33°49′42″N 98°32′29″W (33.828326
column3: along the south shore of Lake Wichita. The Archer County/Wichita County border runs through Lake Wichita
column4: with the city of Wichita Falls on the north side of the border. Downtown Wichita Falls is 8 miles (13 km) to the northeast. Texas State Highway 79 touches the southeast border of the town
column5: leading northeast to Wichita Falls and southwest 17 miles (27 km) to Archer City
